definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Baby angels see me climb, stop my tumbles every time.
sentences.chinese: 寶貝天使看着我醒來，跟隨者我的一舉一動。

sentences.english: You know there are many people tracking each and every move of Nokia.
sentences.chinese: 你知道的，許多人追蹤着諾基亞的一舉一動。

sentences.english: No loss is a college student, conversation elegant, every act and every move all seem to be liberal and dignified.
sentences.chinese: 不虧是大學生，談吐文雅，一舉一動都顯得落落大方。

sentences.english: Young Chinese follow Kaifu Lee`s every move.
sentences.chinese: 李開復，中國的年輕人對其一舉一動都趨之若鶩。

sentences.english: His bond with them influenced almost everything he did.
sentences.chinese: 傑克遜和兒童的聯繫幾乎影響到他的一舉一動。

sentences.english: And her eyes on all my motions with a mute observance hung.
sentences.chinese: 她的雙眸沉默而拘謹地牽掛着我的一舉一動。

sentences.english: Its policy would have influence on all people's fate.
sentences.chinese: 其任何方針及一舉一動均能影響全體百姓的身家性命。

sentences.english: I am very concerned about what they do.
sentences.chinese: 我非常關注他們的一舉一動。

sentences.english: During the search, everything Ballard did had to be kept secret.
sentences.chinese: 在搜尋的過程中，巴拉德的一舉一動都得列爲機密。

sentences.english: Where her every move have been Surveillance and informers.
sentences.chinese: 她在那裏一舉一動都受到監視和告密。

sentences.english: We're newcomers here and must be careful what we do.
sentences.chinese: 我們新來乍到，得注意自己的一舉一動。

sentences.english: She was quick-footed and energetic in all her movements.
sentences.chinese: 她腳步敏捷，一舉一動總是精神飽滿。

sentences.english: That man has sinister designs. You must guard against his every move.
sentences.chinese: 這個人心懷叵測，對他的一舉一動，都要嚴加提防。

sentences.english: When walking in a crowd, one is under scrutiny all the time.
sentences.chinese: 當走在人羣中的時候，人們會注意我們的一舉一動。
我注視這他的一舉一動。

definition: to tease a woman by pretending to be displeased with her/to flirt with a member of the opposite sex/to banter flirtatiously
the cool eye of a bystander/a detached point of view
to affect/to produce a change in sth
lit. spirit and soul upside down (idiom); infatuated and head over heels in love/fascinated/captivated
to concentrate one's attention completely (idiom)/with rapt attention
